resources.string: Rename SHIELD
"An app on SHIELD wants to make SHIELD discoverable by other Bluetooth devices for %1$d seconds. Allow?"
SHIELD info
When you allow data roaming, you may incur significant roaming charges!\n\nThis setting affects all users on this SHIELD.
Encrypt SHIELD
Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt SHIELD each time you power it on

You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt SHIELD, you need to type a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on. You can\'t decrypt SHIELD except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.\n\nEncryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep SHIELD plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data.
Encrypt SHIELD
The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you\'ll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which SHIELD will restart several times.
Wait while SHIELD is encrypted. ^1% complete.

Encryption was interrupted and can\'t complete. As a result, the data on SHIELD is no longer accessible. \n\n To resume using SHIELD, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up SHIELD after the reset, you\'ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account.
%1$s will be disconnected from sharing SHIELD\'s Internet connection.
Allow data exchange when SHIELD touches another device
WARNING: You may incur extra carrier data charges.\n\nSHIELD setup can require significant network activity.
WARNING: SHIELD won\'t be able to verify that your software is up to date.
SHIELD was unable to connect to this Wi-Fi network.
SHIELD not docked
You need to dock SHIELD before setting up dock audio.
Play sound when inserting or removing SHIELD from dock
Don\'t play sound when inserting or removing SHIELD from dock
Switch orientation automatically when rotating SHIELD
Switch orientation automatically when rotating SHIELD
Require PIN to use SHIELD
Require PIN to use SHIELD
SHIELD status
Status of the battery, network, and other information
MDN
Erases all data on SHIELD

"This will erase all data from SHIELD's internal storage, including:


Your Google account

System and app data and settings

Downloaded apps"
Reset SHIELD
Sharing SHIELD\'s Internet connection
Sharing SHIELD\'s Internet connection to 1 device
Sharing SHIELD\'s Internet connection to %1$d devices
Not sharing SHIELD\'s Internet connection
Let apps use GPS on SHIELD to pinpoint your location
About SHIELD

Your SHIELD and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to SHIELD or loss of data that may result from using these apps.
This app can access the following on SHIELD:
This app can access the following on SHIELD. In order to improve performance and reduce memory usage, some of these permissions are available to %1$s because it runs in the same process as %2$s:
Move to SHIELD
If you stop this service, some SHIELD features may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.
SHIELD information
SHIELD idle
SHIELD
Battery used when SHIELD is idle
Removing this account will delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from SHIELD!
This account is required by some apps. You can only remove it by resetting SHIELD to the factory defaults (which deletes all your personal data) in Settings > Backup & reset.

Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your SHIELD.

Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on your SHIELD to the web. A Google Account works this way.

To choose which kinds of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.

Your mobile data connection will be disabled when the specified limit is reached.\n\nBecause SHIELD measures data usage, and your carrier may account for usage differently, consider using a conservative limit.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won\'t work unless you\'re connected to a Wi-Fi network.\n\nThis setting affects all users on this SHIELD.
%2$s: about %1$s used, as measured by SHIELD. Your carrier\'s data usage accounting may differ.
Only SHIELD\'s owner can manage users.
You will lose your space and data on this SHIELD. You can\'t undo this action.
This user\'s space and data will disappear from this SHIELD. You can\'t undo this action.
This setting affects all users on this SHIELD.
This profile\'s space and data will disappear from SHIELD. You can\'t undo this action.
Allow data exchange when SHIELD touches another device
An app wants to make SHIELD visible to other Bluetooth devices. You can change this later in Bluetooth settings.
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth and make SHIELD visible to other devices for %1$d seconds.
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth and make SHIELD visible to other devices. You can change this later in Bluetooth settings.
